name: Spicy Dried Shrimp Consomme
recipeIngredient: 3/4 teaspoon salt, plus more to taste
1 small bunch watercress, tough stems discarded and tender sprigs and leaves rinsed

recipeInstructions.text: Place dried shrimp, carrot, onion, daikon, sesame seeds, pepper flakes, ginger, salt and sugar in a large saucepan. Add the water and bring to a boil. Boil for 5 minutes. Lower the heat and simmer, uncovered, for 20 minutes.
Strain the broth and discard the vegetables. Stir in the vinegar and watercress, season to taste with salt and serve as a first course before barbecued beef.
